PI.long_name:
PI = Exner function * Cp, where (Cp=1004 J/kg/K in RAMS) Exner-function = T/Θ =
(p/p00)^(Rd/Cp)

RTP.long_name:
Total water mixing ratio (water
vapor + condensate) (prognostic variable)

VEG_NDVIP.long_name: past NDVI (NDVI = Normalized Difference Vegetation Index)

SOIL_ENERGY.long_name: soil energy (used to compute soil temperature)

SFCWATER_NLEV.long_name: number of snow (or surface water) levels

SFCWATER_ENERGY.long_name: surface water energy (used to compute surface water temperature)

GROUND_RSAT.long_name: saturation mixing ratio of the top soil/snow surface

GROUND_RVAP.long_name:
Without snowcover, ground_rvap is the effective
saturation mixing ratio of soil

RCO2P.long_name:
CO2 concentration (divide by 1.51724e-6 to get CO2 in ppm) (1.51e-6 = 44(g/mol) / (29g/mol) / 1.e6) where CO2
molar mass = 44 g/mol and Air molar mass = 29g/mol

CO2FLX.long_name:
surface CO2 flux (CAS to first atmospheric level) a.k.a. Net
Ecosystem Exchange (NEE)

ASSIMN.long_name: uptake of CO2 by canopy plants

RA.long_name: CAS to lowest atmos layer aerodynamic resistance

RB.long_name:
leaf surface to CAS
aerodynamic resistance

APAR.long_name: absorbed fraction of photosynthetically active radiation

ABC1NP.long_name: Absorbing carbon (1% BC, 99% OC) number concentration

ABC2NP.long_name:
Absorbing carbon (2% BC, 98% OC) number
concentration

ABC1MP.long_name: Absorbing carbon (1% BC, 99% OC) mass mixing ratio

ABC2MP.long_name:
Absorbing carbon (2% BC,
98% OC) mass mixing ratio

SALT_FILM_MP.long_name: sea-salt film drop mass mixing ratio

SALT_JET_MP.long_name: sea-salt jet drop mass mixing ratio

SALT_SPUM_MP.long_name:
sea-salt spume drop mass
mixing ratio

REGEN_AERO1_MP.long_name: sub-micron regenerated aerosol mass mixing ratio

REGEN_AERO2_MP.long_name: super-micron regenerated aerosol mass mixing ratio

RIFNP.long_name: ice nuclei mass concentration (SBM CNT scheme)

FFIN.long_name:
ccn mass mixing ratio
distribution (SBM only) (d(mixr)/dln(r))

CNMCP.long_name: total aerosol mass within cloud droplets

CNMPP.long_name: total aerosol mass within pristine ice

DNMCP.long_name: total dust mass within cloud droplets

DNMPP.long_name: total dust mass within pristine ice

DINCP.long_name: dust mass within cloud droplets via ice nucleation

DINDP.long_name: dust mass within dizzle via ice nucleation

DINRP.long_name: dust mass within rain via ice nucleation

DINPP.long_name: dust mass within pristine ice via ice nucleation

DINSP.long_name: dust mass within snow via ice nucleation

DINAP.long_name: dust mass within aggregates via ice nucleation

DINGP.long_name:
dust mass within graupel via
ice nucleation

DINHP.long_name: dust mass within hail via ice nucleation

SNMCP.long_name: total soluble aerosol mass within cloud droplets

SNMDP.long_name:
total soluble aerosol mass
within dizzle

SNMRP.long_name: total soluble aerosol mass within rain

SNMPP.long_name: total soluble aerosol mass within pristine ice

SNMSP.long_name:
total soluble aerosol mass
within snow

SNMAP.long_name: total soluble aerosol mass within aggregates

SNMGP.long_name: total soluble aerosol mass within graupel

SNMHP.long_name:
total soluble aerosol mass
within hail

RESOL_AERO1_MP.long_name:
sub-micron regenerated aerosol soluble mass mixing
ratio

RESOL_AERO2_MP.long_name:
super-micron regenerated aerosol soluble mass mixing
ratio

ACCPR.long_name: accumulated rain over the course of the simulation

ACCPP.long_name: accumulated pristine ice over the course of the simulation

ACCPS.long_name: accumulated snow over the course of the simulation

ACCPA.long_name: accumulated aggregates over the course of the simulation

ACCPG.long_name:
accumulated graupel over the
course of the simulation

ACCPH.long_name:
accumulated hail over the
course of the simulation

ACCPD.long_name: accumulated drizzle over the course of the simulation

ACCPIP.long_name:
accumulated plates over the course of the simulation (SBM
only)

ACCPIC.long_name:
accumulated columns over the
course of the simulation (SBM only)

ACCPID.long_name:
accumulated dendrites over
the course of the simulation (SBM only)

PCPG.long_name:
microphysics precipitation per timestep (for water, kg/m^2 =
mm), Used by LEAF/SIB surface models

QPCPG.long_name:
microphysics precipitation energy per timestep, Used by
LEAF surface model

DPCPG.long_name:
microphysics precipitation depth per timestep, Used by
LEAF surface model

ACCPDUST.long_name: surface accumulated mass of aerosols identified as dust

ACCPAERO.long_name: Total surface accumulated mass of aerosols

PCPRDUST.long_name:
surface accumulation rate of
aerosols identified as dust

PCPRAERO.long_name:
Total surface accumulation
rate of aerosols

AODT.long_name:
Aerosol optical depth in visible
radiation band-3

COSZ.long_name: cosine of the solar zenith angle

TKEP.long_name:
turbulent kinetic energy (from Mellor-Yamada and Deardorf
schemes only)

HKH.long_name:
horizontal eddy diffusivity coefficient for heat for scalar quantities (un-density
weighted)

VKH.long_name:
vertical eddy diffusivity coefficient for heat for scalar quantities (un-density
weighted)

RHKM.long_name: horizontal eddy diffusivity coefficient for momentum

RVKM.long_name: vertical eddy diffusivity coefficient for momentum

RVKH.long_name:
vertical eddy diffusivity
coefficient for heat for scalar quantities

SFLUX_T.long_name:
surface temperature flux (multiply by Cp [~1004 J/(kg*K)] to get surface
sensible heat flux in W/m^2)

SFLUX_R.long_name:
surface moisture flux (multiply by Lv [~2.5e6 J/kg] to get
surface latent heat flux in W/m^2)

RCSRC.long_name:
convective cloud water mixing ratio tendency (KF scheme
only)

RRSRC.long_name: convective rain mixing ratio tendency (KF scheme only)

RPSRC.long_name:
convective pristine ice mixing ratio tendency (KF scheme
only)

RSSRC.long_name:
convective snow mixing ratio
tendency (KF scheme only)

W0AVG.long_name: a running mean average of vertical velocity (KF scheme only)

W0AVGLT.long_name:
a running mean average of the horizontal components of the
contravariant vertical velocity (KF scheme only)

NCA.long_name:
integer counter keeping track of number of timesteps that convective tendencies
maintained (KF scheme only)

CONVGO.long_name:
integer which keeps track if pre-convection checks satisfied
(KF scheme only)

WP_BUOY_THETA.long_name:
instantaneous vertical velocity contribution from Theta-V
buoyancy computation

WP_BUOY_COND.long_name:
instantaneous vertical velocity contribution from condensate
loading

WP_ADVDIF.long_name:
instantaneous vertical velocity contribution by the
combination of both advection and diffusion

LATHEATVAPT.long_name:
change in (T or Θ) due to vapor
diffusion and cloud & ice nucleation

LATHEATFRZT.long_name:
change in (T or Θ) due to
collision-coalescence and melting routines

LATHEATVAP.long_name:
Instantaneous / single timestep (T or Θ) due to vapor diffusion and cloud & ice
nucleation

LATHEATFRZ.long_name:
Instantaneous / single timestep (T or Θ) due to
collision-coalescence and melting routines

NUCCLDRT.long_name:
nucleation of cloud and drizzle
water mixing ratio

NUCICERT.long_name:
nucleation of pristine ice mixing ratio from all
nucleation mechanisms

VAPLIQT.long_name:
vapor deposition summed for all liquid hydrometeor species
(this can be + or - depending on growth or evaporation)

VAPICET.long_name:
vapor deposition summed for all ice hydrometeor species (this can be + or - depending
on growth or evaporation)

MELTICET.long_name:
melting of all ice species in melting routine (these are the category mass transfers due to
melting)

CLD2RAINT.long_name: cloud water transferred to rain via collection

RIMECLDT.long_name:
cloud water collected by all ice species (rcx values; see
mic_coll.f90) (mass transfer from cloud)

RAIN2ICET.long_name:
rain water collected by ice species (rcx values; see mic_coll.f90) (mass transfer
from rain)

ICE2RAINT.long_name:
ice melting due to collection of rain (rcy values; see mic_coll.f90) (mass transfer ice
to rain)

AGGREGATET.long_name: ice amount transferred to aggregates via collection

INUCIFNRT.long_name:
condensation/immersion freezing ice nucleation from ice
nuclei

INUCHAZRT.long_name: haze droplet nucleation tied to aerosol concentration

VAPCLDT.long_name:
vapor diffusion / evaporation on
cloud droplets

VAPPRIST.long_name: vapor diffusion / evaporation on pristine ice

VAPDRIZT.long_name: vapor diffusion / evaporation on drizzle droplets

MELTPRIST.long_name: mass transfer from pristine ice due to melting

MELTSNOWT.long_name:
mass transfer from snow due to
melting

MELTAGGRT.long_name: mass transfer from aggregates due to melting

MELTGRAUT.long_name:
mass transfer from graupel due
to melting

MELTHAILT.long_name:
mass transfer from hail due to
melting

RIMECLDSNOWT.long_name: mass transfer from cloud due to riming by snow

RIMECLDAGGRT.long_name: mass transfer from cloud due to riming by aggregates

RIMECLDGRAUT.long_name: mass transfer from cloud due to riming by graupel

RIMECLDHAILT.long_name: mass transfer from cloud due to riming by hail

RAIN2PRT.long_name:
mass transfer from rain due to
collisions with pristine ice

RAIN2SNT.long_name: mass transfer from rain due to collisions with snow

RAIN2AGT.long_name:
mass transfer from rain due to
collisions with aggregates

RAIN2GRT.long_name:
mass transfer from rain due to
collisions with graupel

RAIN2HAT.long_name: mass transfer from rain due to collisions with hail

AGGRSELFPRIST.long_name: mass transfer to aggregates due to pristine ice self-collection

AGGRSELFSNOWT.long_name:
mass transfer to aggregates due
to snow self-collection

AGGRPRISSNOWT.long_name:
mass transfer to aggregates due
to pristine ice / snow collisions

DUST1CLDRT.long_name: nucleation of cloud droplet mixing ratio from dust mode 1

DUST2CLDRT.long_name: nucleation of cloud droplet mixing ratio from dust mode 2

DUST1DRZRT.long_name: nucleation of drizzle droplet mixing ratio from dust mode 1

DUST2DRZRT.long_name: nucleation of drizzle droplet mixing ratio from dust mode 2

KPP_OLD.long_name: Index to ID past value of Us,Vs

KPP_NEW.long_name: Index to ID new value of Us,Vs

KPP_FREEZ_FLAG.long_name: Fraction of levels prevented from freezing

KPP_RESET_FLAG.long_name: Flag to indicate isothermal column, reset T/S to climo

KPP_SWDK_OPT.long_name: Solar shortwave flux fraction on DM depths

KPP_SWFRAC.long_name: Solar shortwave flux fraction on ZM depths

KPP_TINC_FCORR.long_name: Temperature increment from flux correction with depth

KPP_SINC_CORR.long_name:
Salinity increment from flux
correction with depth

KPP_U.long_name: Latest value of ocean U current

KPP_V.long_name: Latest value of ocean V current

KPP_U_init.long_name:
Initial value of ocean U
current

KPP_V_init.long_name: Initial value of ocean V current
